The Licensor grants the Licensee the exclusive right to use, produce, and distribute the Invention DE‑2021‑12345B1 worldwide.

Section 2 Royalty
The Licensee shall pay a one‑time fee of EUR 150,000 and thereafter annual royalties of 5 % of net sales.
